page.title: 06FARMING-A FARM LABOURER
page.content: Mr.Becky,aged 21,has been working on a farm for 5 years.He enjoys his job and the farm covers an area of 300 acres.He got the job by working at the farm after school and during school holidays and when he left school the farmer offered full time work.He didn't need any qualifications but had to serve a three year apprenticeship.The job involves driving a tractor,milking cows and general stock work.He fears for the future as the farm might be forced to cut down its area or stock for economic reasons or become more mechanised.He loves the work because it changes from season to season.The farm employs two full time men and several seasonal workers.
